SEARCH
Package com.shanebeestudios.skbee.api.region.scheduler

Interface Scheduler<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Underlying task return type
All Known Implementing Classes:
FoliaScheduler, SpigotScheduler
public interface Scheduler<T>
Scheduler for scheduling tasks

Changes based on Spigot/Paper vs. Folia usage
